<Text: Cruyff Turn:  Instead of kicking it, he would drag the ball behind his planted foot with the inside of his crossing foot, turn through 180 degrees, and accelerate away from the defender.>

Text: Cruyff Turn:  This feint was executed by Cruyff in the 1974 FIFA World Cup, first being seen in the Netherlands' match against Sweden where he outwitted Swedish defender Jan Olsson.
Triplets:<Cruyff Turn

Text: Cruyff Turn:  The move was soon widely copied by other players around the world.
